name: Geopolitical Shock
description: Surprise realization of major geopolitical risk events leads to sharp equity corrections and flight to safe havens.

name: Sovereign Debt Stress
description: Widening sovereign risk premiums and higher CDS spreads trigger broad bond sell-off and equity pullback.

name: Euro Area Policy Uncertainty
description: Elevated policy uncertainty and geopolitical tensions weigh on Euro area growth, leading to mixed asset impacts.
